wordpressPost.title: What Inspires Us: WeSpire's New Employee Engagement Persona
wordpressPost.content:
Big things are happening here at WeSpire.
Every day, our customers and their employees are discovering the positive impact they can make in sustainability, volunteering, well-being, and corporate citizenship with the help of WeSpire’s employee engagement platform.
Corporate leaders in HR, corporate responsibility, sustainability, communications, and operations are realizing measurable benefits in resource consumption, employee satisfaction and retention, and customer interactions. Using our configurable library of hundreds of action-based programs backed by behavioral science, our customers are empowered to reach their greatest potential.
“Employee engagement is a leading indicator of future business success, and Gallup has discovered close ties between engagement and outcomes such as turnover, profitability and productivity. As the percentage of their employees who are engaged at work increases, companies find themselves better positioned to grow. And when they grow, companies consequently help strengthen the economy.” ‘ Gallup

What Inspires Us

As Gallup reports, our customers are realizing the short and long term benefits of adopting employee engagement programs. And as our customer base grows and our company matures, we decided that it was time for our website to evolve to share the knowledge we’ve gained.
Our new website not only gives you the ability to explore and learn about WeSpire’s employee engagement platform, but also keep up-to-date on the latest industry news, research and trends. Like our product, we have built an online presence that allows visitors to easily consume information on any device and in multiple formats (PDF, presentation, video, etc.)’all in an effort to help raise awareness around the enormous benefits and bottom line results of developing an employee engagement strategy.

WeSpire is Growing

We’ve added many new customers to our roster such as Target, Bentall-Kennedy, and Cox Communications as we see a trend towards company-wide engagement coverage that also span utilization of multiple goals around volunteering, sustainability and CSR.

WeSpire is Changing

With the focus of employee engagement reaching beyond the confines of sustainability and corporate social responsibility into communications, operations and human resource functions, we’re actively evolving our product to meet demand through an expansion of our Project Library, recognition and reporting.

WeSpire is Evolving

Our website redesign is at the heart of our evolution as a product company. As the WeSpire brand matures, so should the channels that it utilizes to interact with its audience. We want our product experience of engagement to be reflected in an intuitive and personalized experience with our public persona. Our new website is highly visual, interactive, and easy to consume no matter the device and we’re proud to have a forum for discussion about topics that help companies understand what makes an employee engagement program successful.
